description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Update Terracotta version to 0.4.1-rc.1  
2. Add online network status detection  
3. Fix the issue where Cleanroom automatically selects Java incorrectly  
4. Optimize the key style list by automatically scrolling to the selected style  
5. Fix the issue where the direction key style cannot be previewed in real time  
6. Fix the issue where editing keys in-game is ineffective  
7. Adjust the source address of the control repository

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.更新Terracotta版本至0.4.1-rc.1
2.增加联机网络状态检测
3.修复Cleanroom自动选择Java错误的问题
4.优化按键样式列表，自动滑动按键样式列表到已选择的样式
5.修复方向键样式无法实时阅览的问题
6.修复游戏内编辑按键无效的问题
7.调整控件仓库源地址
